attribute.name: description
attribute.value: Check that plan from Group 3 level can spread to Skup level. This check fails when all Skups in Group3 are Cancelled or Denied to order.

attribute.name: formula
attribute.value: PQProdAssortPP = FilterStap && FilterCmpp && FilterGrp3 && FilterVend && FilterSkup && FilterAssortPP

attribute.name: formula
attribute.value: FilterAssortPP = if(AMAllB, true, if(AMSyntB, LDCuAssortB, if(AMCleanB, LDCuAssortBClean, if(AMDeltaB, LDCuAssortBDelta, false))))
